title: Catholic Catechism Collection (9 books)
description:
Collection of Catholic catechisms and related works. All are in epub and mobi formats, most from a retail source, except as noted below.


1. Catechism of the Catholic Church (The current official primary catechism for the Catholic Church as a whole)

2. Compendium of the Catechism of the Catholic Church (Brief Q&A version of the official CCC)

3. YOUCAT: Youth Catechism of the Catholic Church (Official catechism for young people)

4. United States Catholic Catechism for Adults (Official American catechism for adults)

5. Baltimore Catechism No.4 (Old American catechism, part of a series very popular in its day (late 19th, early 20th century); now superseded)

6. The Catechism of Pope St. Piux X (pdf format; I believe this was the first official Catholic catechism, written in response to the crisis of the Reformation)

7. The Catholic Catechism by John Hardon (Catechism written in the 1970s by a well-known American Jesuit; highly traditional and intellectual)

8. Catholic Christianity: A Complete Catechism of Catholic Beliefs Based on the Catechism of the Catholic Church by Peter Kreeft (A recent attempt to summarize the contents of the CCC by a very popular conservative American apologist)

9. The Companion To The Catechism Of The Catholic Church (Anthology of texts quoted or referenced in the CCC) 

-----

Many thanks to the original uploaders.
